name: Plague Pit
description:
NOTE: It's not possible to make progress in the game due to a game breaking bug.

The Black Death is sweeping through the countryside. Bury the bodies to keep the plague from spreading, but don't get infected yourself!

Bodies above the ground cause the Rat Meter to increase. Touching bodies causes the Skull Meter to increase. If either meter fills completely, the game is over.

Arrow Keys: Move

X: Jump

Z + Arrow Key: Dig in a direction
